title: Freak
description: This is a strange world we live in. You just have no idea how strange. The same cannot be said for Lily Gomer, an agent for Union. Four years ago, the truth about the world was revealed to her, and nothing has been the same since. Lily is submerged in a world of monsters and prophecies, tasked with keeping her best friend safe and, most importantly, in his skin. Follow Lily through her bizarre and sinuous journey in this first installment of the Freak series.
author: Sydney Long
